com.team08storyapp

Class OnlineStoriesActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListActivity
      • com.team08storyapp.OnlineStoriesActivity

  • public class OnlineStoriesActivity
extends ListActivity
    OnlineStoriesActivity is a view class that displays a list of stories that are available online. Users are able to either download or read an online story by long-clicking a story in list and selecting one of the above options through a context menu.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

      • onClickSearchButton

        public void onClickSearchButton(View view)
        This method is called from a button click that allows the user to search through the list of online Stories. They must have a search string entered into the search text area. If they do not it will just return the full list of online stories. If they have a search string that is contained within a title or author of any online story, that story will be displayed in the list for the user to chose from. This method uses ElasticSearch (@link http://www.elasticsearch.org/) to search the webservice for the online Stories.
        Parameters:
        view - The screen used to display the Online Story list for the user.
        See Also:
        ESHelper

      • onClickFeelingLuckButton

        public void onClickFeelingLuckButton(View view)
        This method is called from a button click that allows the user to ask for a random Online Story to be viewed for their reading pleasure. It will get a random story and pass this story to the next activity for displaying to the user. Once this is complete the user should be presented with a display of the first page of the story.
        Parameters:
        view - The screen used to display the Online Story list for the user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
